title: How do you counter siege comps on Legend of the Poro king?

replies.body:
1. Ban champions (Caitlin, Ziggs come to mind)
2. Pick poke / siege champs
3. Get some strong engage
4. Dodge poros, hit yours (ie: get good)
5. Play around your power spikes, particularly mid game if you have tanks. Get some early sustain (runes, refillables, the 950 dorans shield alt item)
6. Get wave clear. ADCs runanns and statik. Mages such as orianna and sandra (which are great in team fights also, thus good in howling abyss)
